name: Collecting Christmas 2
description:
Hop around as a tree!  Transform into a Christmas tree by collecting decorations and presents.  Watch out for lumberjacks!  Oh, and spikes, too!

Try to collect as many decorations and presents as you can.  You don't need to collect them all, though.  Once you've found the star, return to the village!

NOTE: There is an issue where the sound will start to lag after restarting a stage when playing the web version in Firefox. For the best experience, use Chrome or Edge, or play the standalone version. Sorry for any inconvenience!

Controls
  • Move - left / right
  • Jump - space
  • Listen - up
  • Pause - escape
  • Unpause - escape / enter / space
  • Fullscreen - F4
  • Toggle music - M
  • Redo - R
